data.text: @CanBorder So upon entry into Canada as a triple vaxxed resident, I still have to test 24 hours before arrival into Canada?

@MissSunshi @CanBorder I flew to Florida on March 1st and was told we needed an Antigen test. Got it at Shopper's for $45.00. Waste of money. Everyone on the flight was complaining coz no one asked to show proof. Had we not done it, I'm sure different story.🤷🏾‍♀️

@jimlewy @CanBorder Why?  Science differ here in Canada? When they open up the borders for those with natural immunity some might start to believe the crock they are pushing. Until then... fool me once..
@CanBorder Can someone in charge please take 5 seconds to think about the usefulness of continuing this bloated bureaucratic garbage?
@CanBorder if a canadian has been vaccinated fully while abroad, are the related documents sufficient to allow exemption from 2 wk quarantine? and allow interprovincial plane/train travel?

@CanBorder Drop the vaccine requirement. The vaccines don’t work. If people test negative, that’s suffice. It really isn’t about punishing people as JT would like it to be. It’s about living life while taking precautions. #CanadaHasFallen #canada
@CanBorder What about those with natural immunity? Are you following the science?
